attributes.action: Charge all foreign national non residents for healthcare
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign this petition if you beleive that the only people who should be entitled to our free NHS is british passport holders AND all foreign nationals who are resident in this country. Anyone else must pay! People are taking advantage of our free healthcare by organising trips to the UK to get free operations and medical check ups. Expectant mothers (including Americans!) even organise to come here on thier due date to get free maternity care! The british tax payer is paying for all of it! It must stop now! Charge them now!
